_comments.info: This is the configuration file for the Cryologger GVT.
_comments.instructions: Modify the values below to configure the device. Ensure all values are valid.
_comments.seasonalLoggingMode: Set to ENABLED or DISABLED to control seasonal logging behavior.
_comments.rollingAwakeHours: Duration the device stays awake in ROLLING mode (hours, 0-23).
_comments.rollingAwakeMinutes: Duration the device stays awake in ROLLING mode (minutes, 0-59).
_comments.rollingSleepHours: Duration the device stays asleep in ROLLING mode (hours, 0-23).
_comments.rollingSleepMinutes: Duration the device sleepse in ROLLING mode (minutes, 0-59).
_comments.gnssGpsEnabled: Enable or disable GPS satellite constellation.
_comments.gnssGloEnabled: Enable or disable GLONASS satellite constellation (0-1).
_comments.gnssGalEnabled: Enable or disable Galileo satellite constellation (0-1).
_comments.gnssBdsEnabled: Enable or disable BeiDou satellite constellation (0-1).
_comments.gnssSbasEnabled: Enable or disable SBAS satellite augmentation (0-1).
_comments.gnssQzssEnabled: Enable or disable QZSS satellite constellation (0-1).
